questions.question: I will call you ………………………… I hear from them.
…………………………… it was a tough task, I managed to finish it.
questions.description: Though is a conjunction used to connect two contrasting ideas. Despite is a preposition.

questions.question: Intelligent ………………………. she was, she couldn’t pass the test.
questions.description: Intelligent as she was or intelligent though she was means the same as though she was intelligent.

questions.question: Do you know the reason ……………………….. she hates me?
The girl ………………………… calculator had been stolen complained to the teacher.
questions.description: The girl complained to the teacher. Her calculator had been stolen. The relative pronoun whose replaces possessive pronouns like her, his, their etc.

questions.question: Last month I watched an interesting movie the name of ……………………….. I don’t remember.
We bought some mangoes from ……………………………. we extracted juice.
She married a handsome architect ………………………….. she met on social media.
questions.description: In identifying relative clauses, that can replace whom in an informal style.

questions.question: I went to a store …………………………. they sell Indian spices.
questions.description: There can mean in which or at which.

questions.question: ……………………………. you had been careful, you wouldn’t have made this mistake.
…………………………… we act now, we will lose this opportunity.
I have no idea ……………………………… she is talking about.
